Type.Name: CodePropertySetValueReferenceExpression

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodePropertySetValueReferenceExpression extends System.CodeDom.CodeExpression

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: represents the value argument of a property set method call within a property set method declaration.
A property set method typically assigns or uses the value assigned to the property. Within the property set method, this value is represented by an implicit variable represented in CodeDOM by a .

summary.para: Represents the value argument of a property set method call within a property set method.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.
